job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to revolutionize the telecom industry with AI-powered innovation? We're seeking a forward-thinking Java Developer to help us reshape how service providers monetize their networks through our cutting-edge Charging-as-a-Service platform.

   Picture yourself architecting a cloud-native charging engine that handles massive transaction volumes while leveraging AI to transform complex billing scenarios into elegant solutions. Our platform isn't just another charging system - it's the future of telecom monetization, powered by advanced natural language processing and machine learning capabilities.

   We respect your time: our streamlined 4-hour application process can be completed at your pace, with quick turnaround times - assessment results within 48 hours and interview decisions in 2 business days.

   If you're excited about being at the intersection of AI and enterprise software innovation, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * Pioneer the development of our next-gen Charging-as-a-Service platform, where scalability meets innovation
     * Create intelligent tools that harness the power of NLP and ML to revolutionize plan management
     * Push the boundaries of what's possible by integrating cutting-edge AI tools into your development workflow

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Wrestling with infrastructure headaches - we've streamlined these tasks to keep you focused on innovation
     * Getting stuck in meeting marathons - we prioritize your coding time over endless discussions, * Architect and enhance our telecom charging platform to deliver unprecedented speed-to-market and unlimited scalability
     * Design and implement AI-powered features that transform complex billing workflows into intuitive processes
job_details.full_text:
Java Developer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Ready to revolutionize the telecom industry with AI-powered innovation? We're seeking a forward-thinking Java Developer to help us reshape how service providers monetize their networks through our cutting-edge Charging-as-a-Service platform.

   Picture yourself architecting a cloud-native charging engine that handles massive transaction volumes while leveraging AI to transform complex billing scenarios into elegant solutions. Our platform isn't just another charging system - it's the future of telecom monetization, powered by advanced natural language processing and machine learning capabilities.

   We respect your time: our streamlined 4-hour application process can be completed at your pace, with quick turnaround times - assessment results within 48 hours and interview decisions in 2 business days.

   If you're excited about being at the intersection of AI and enterprise software innovation, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * Pioneer the development of our next-gen Charging-as-a-Service platform, where scalability meets innovation
     * Create intelligent tools that harness the power of NLP and ML to revolutionize plan management
     * Push the boundaries of what's possible by integrating cutting-edge AI tools into your development workflow

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Wrestling with infrastructure headaches - we've streamlined these tasks to keep you focused on innovation
     * Getting stuck in meeting marathons - we prioritize your coding time over endless discussions, * Architect and enhance our telecom charging platform to deliver unprecedented speed-to-market and unlimited scalability
     * Design and implement AI-powered features that transform complex billing workflows into intuitive processes

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on a Java Developer role within the telecom industry, mentioning AI-powered innovation and NLP/ML capabilities. However, it lacks specific details about building, training, or deploying AI models, fine-tuning LLMs, or developing RAG systems. The emphasis is on integrating AI tools into a Java development workflow and enhancing an existing platform, rather than core AI engineering tasks. The role appears to be a traditional software development position that leverages AI, rather than a dedicated AI engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The role is explicitly for a 'Java Developer' and involves 'architecting a cloud-native charging engine', 'pioneering the development of our next-gen Charging-as-a-Service platform', and 'architect and enhance our telecom charging platform'. These are core software development activities.
The description mentions 'integrating cutting-edge AI tools into your development workflow', which implies incorporating AI functionalities into existing software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: integrating cutting-edge AI tools into your development workflow

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and implementing features that leverage AI to improve billing workflows, which is a software development task focused on application functionality.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement AI-powered features that transform complex billing workflows into intuitive processes

job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions leveraging 'AI to transform complex billing scenarios' and 'harness the power of NLP and ML to revolutionize plan management'. While not detailing model building, it implies the application of ML/NLP capabilities.
job_tasks.phrase: leveraging AI to transform complex billing scenarios

job_tasks.justification: The description states the platform is 'powered by advanced natural language processing and machine learning capabilities', indicating the use or integration of these modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: powered by advanced natural language processing and machine learning capabilities

job_tasks.justification: The role involves creating 'intelligent tools that harness the power of NLP and ML', suggesting the application of these modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: Create intelligent tools that harness the power of NLP and ML

soft_skills.phrase: revolutionize the telecom industry with AI-powered innovation
push the boundaries of what's possible
If you're excited about being at the intersection of AI and enterprise software innovation, we want to hear from you.
